bibl.title: The Meaning of the Word "Limes" ("limiton") in the Papyri.
bibl.note: There is ambiguity and confusion in giving meaning to the term "limes" as it appears in the Egyptian documents and other sources. It would be helpful to translate "limes" as "frontier" or "frontier-district".
bibl.seg: Mayerson Philip, The Meaning of the Word "Limes" ("limiton") in the Papyri.

There is ambiguity and confusion in giving meaning to the term "limes" as it appears in the Egyptian documents and other sources. It would be helpful to translate "limes" as "frontier" or "frontier-district".
